First time ever asking for a refund. The game looked like it was going to be awesome, but what a let down.  When you're a lvl 1 killer going up against a fully stacked lvled group of survivors with all super rare perks, good luck. As the survivor its not so bad, but I would like to kill people as well. As the killer you will spend most of your time playing ring around the rosey as they hop through the same 2 windows or fences.  While you do this the others are turning on the generators and escaping.  If you leave the game of ring around the rosey then they will just turn on the generator you left them by.  Once you know the general lay out of the map its pretty hard to get killed as a survivor plus the added perks later on make you pretty untrackable or being able to be snuck up on.  I get the survivors need to be quicker than the killer, but to be able to just hop over the same things over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over... get my point. I can see how this game would be fun in a lan type setting or with a group of friends over vent or something, but as of right now not so much. I guess I will get my serial killer fix when Friday the 13th game comes out this October.  Really hope I get my very first refund.

Very fun game, i am super addicted. Playing the killer is just as scary because you just feel like a monster doing all this horrible actions. Very spooky, high quality, realistic gameplay, and best of all is the game is very thrilling more than scary, which doesnt make you too scared to play, but scared enough to come back for more. Would definitelyl reccomend if you enjoy thriller films, games, books, or tv shows. I would not reccomend if you have heart problems, glaucoma, anxiety desorders, high risk of ptsd, or if you are pregnant. 10/10 game, \//\ vapenayshall. #livingmeme
this game is fun and i love it but the party system needs to be added. plus this game is poorly optimized with crappy servers to back it up but it is fun and still new

Overall this game has a promising future, but my main problem is how annoying the survivors can be. You have no idea how many times I've been chasing a survivor so he jumps in and out of the same window about 30/40 times and I stand on the other side of the window and watch him while he makes eye contact with me and teabags furiously. It ruins the feel of adrenaline the game should be providing. Some people don't do this, thankfully and they actually run away, but if you're the  killer and the last survivor is professionally good at jumping in and out of windows, you're either going to have to leave the game or just walk away and let him win.
4 Survivors and 1 killer, enough said.

2020 Edit: Okay so i returned to this game from a 2.5 years of break, after they got rid of host servers and decided to switch to their precious "dedicated servers" this game has gotten so competitive and toxic you won't even believe it, this game just keeps going on an endless cycle, before the dedicated server release there was actually a honor code among the killers and survivors, most of the killers barely run noed on their build before because playerbase was around the same country for every players and they cared about each other having fun in the game but right now every single survivor and killer is playing this game in the most toxic way they can because they don't care about anyone else they just want to win the game and end it as soon as possible. Wonder why ? Because that survivor just decisive striked and used unbreakable on you got slugged and tunneled by his/her last matches and doesn't want to experience that again same goes for the killer, want to know why he uses noed, op addons or mori ? Because he got matched against a toxic swf who runs 4 decisives, 4 unbreakable and flashlights, he got gen-rushed, the person they downed got flashlight saved, the person they grabbed got out of his grasp with decisive etc. No one cares about having fun anymore in this game its full of unnecessarily tryhards who just sweats their ass of for a few bloodpoints and they ruin other persons experience. This game was much more fun back in 2017-2018 aka before they released their "dedicated servers".

Really like this game, dont listen to any negative reviews about match making, I have no problem with finding a lobby, a small problem(they are going to fix) is i may join a game with people who are much higher or lower leveled then me.

The game itself is amazing a great feel of suspense and terror comes from it when your playing(maybe even a feel of joy if your playing the killer). Its fun and never gets boring i recommend this to anyone whose trying to find a change of pace in gaming.

Best slasher online type game you can get at the moment! Ignore angry hate + salty reviews. Sure the game needs some bug fixes here and there, but nothing too game breaking! And for the price you really cannot go wrong at all! Give it a shot! 4 player survivors VS 1 killer. Different type of killers, Different type of survivors. Each have there own perks! Maps switch around! (could be a little better i suppose) ah well keep on the look out for Last Year & Friday the 13th Im sure those slasher onine games will be great as well!

At first this game was fun. Getting found by a killer was horrifying and an adrenaline rush, but now its just a nuisance. Killers  seem to move must faster now than a few days ago. Ive read alot about hacked/cheating players....make sense now. Queue system is GARBAGE! It takes about 10 minutes for each round that my friend and I want to join a match together. Cant imagine trying to do it with 2 other friends as well. Playing as a killer can be just as frustrating. Players seem invisible, and the scratch marks on the ground that are supposed to help do nothing to help. When you do catch someone they are able to wiggle away in less than 5 seconds. I wish i didnt have more than 4 hours into this game so I could get a refund. Also buying the deluxe edition makes this more irritating since it was almost double the cost and half the value.

Don't even get me started on the moronic schemes of the window hoppers.  This puts you at a disadvantage because killers niceley crawl through the fucking window taking all their time in the world while the survivors just windows hop.  Sometimes I wish the devs added a perk where you could put sticky bombs from GTA V on the windows sill so when the acursed windows hoppers neared I could blow their shit. 这算是我买的第二个steam游戏吧，所以好和坏我并不能根据以往的经历做出精确的评测，我只是根据我的游戏体验来谈谈这款游戏给我带来的感受。
首先，作为一款恐怖游戏，它的目的是给玩家带来恐惧和刺激，然而事实上当你玩人类玩久了后你就会觉得这款游戏从恐怖游戏变成了搞笑游戏，不停的戏耍屠夫使得游戏恐惧感锐减，还有千篇一律的逃生模式也使得游戏的可玩性不足，而这就是游戏制作小组需要考虑的问题了。因为这是一款积攒血球升级的游戏，所以难免有些人喜欢使用修改跳过收集血球的过程，这是人的懒惰本性，无可厚非，但是却对慢慢升级的人来说是不公平的。
另外，除了修改挂还有加速挂和满血复活挂，甚至是拔线结束游戏，这些都是一个联机游戏需要克服的问题。
最后，希望DBD能够成长起来，让我们这些玩家见证一款有趣的恐怖PVP游戏成为史诗的历程吧。

Dead By Daylight is a great horror game.I bought the deluxe edition,the artwork,ost and masks for payday were worth the price in my opinion,So Now to the real game.So this game was a wonderful horror game.They were great at making  us fear the killer.The sudden shocks and the heartbeats makes the game more realistic.Although there are a few stuff that you can use to make the game easier,the killer also could use it as well.This game has a fair balance between killers and survivors which is good,although the killer is faster and has more senses than survivors,killers make noises which makes it obvious for survivors.On the other hand Survivors only make noises if they fail at repairing a generator.The Camera is quite nice with the third and first person thing.
Pros:
Great Gameplay
Matching Soundtrack 
Fair Balance of Classes
Good artwork
Awesome Environments
Gets the 'spooky feel' to the game
Cons:
a few bugs
Multiplayer survivors quit easily even in game.
No full storyline,we only know a bit of each character and none of each killers.

Result:9/10
The game  itself is very interesting yet the bugs and  how survivors can quit easily in multiplayer is quite annoying.The story itself isnt too clear yet the great and Terrifying gameplay would make the game worth the price.

很难想象才3个G的游戏所带给我的恐怖与刺激感丝毫不亚于生化危机和寂静岭。虽然画面没有那么精细，但是这不是重点，气氛的渲染从等待进入游戏时的心跳声就开始了，加上很棒的环境烘托：浓雾，月黑风高的夜晚，乌鸦的叫声等等。。。不过最能带给人紧张感的还是屠夫靠近时的心跳。说到屠夫，目前已出的三个里面我最讨厌（喜欢?)隐身屠夫，人类最大的恐惧源自未知，而隐身屠夫恰好抓住这个点，不断使用技能所带的钟声对全图范围内的幸存者造成极大的心理压力。随着游戏的进行，当你失去一个又一个的同伴并且最终只剩你和屠夫时，那份恐怖与心理压力真的是无法言语。这款游戏真的是良心之作，可玩性非常高，无论你是幸存者还是屠夫都要揣摩对方的心理来行动，非常推荐！！！

Great game. Love the concept. Hours of fun. Only downside for me is the connection bugs that probably shoulda been knocked out in Beta. (for example, trying to join a game as a survivor and getting "failed to join game" again and again and again and again. Also, the random disconnects where the game says "connection to steam lost" and closes the game on you in the middle of a match.)

The game is still in Beta, but the devs are listening. Mistakes are being made, but changes are constantly being applied.

Pros:
1.) The controls are smooth and work well. This is important when reacting to jump scares.
2.) Objectives are simple to understand and intuitive. There's a proper learning curve for the minor mechanics, such as personal items.
3.) Nothing will ever make you lose unless you make mistakes. It's so easy to learn from your mistakes, which is so nice.

Cons:
1.) Players with low levels/ranks (like myself) tend to stick with a very predictable meta/style. This causes an awkward balance/scale: The survivors either win super easy at the cost of a single player, or everyone dies. This tilt happens constantly, and will continue until new fixes occur or a new meta exists. (Will be fixed with time)
2.) The levelling system is currently broken. Survivors who escape without scoring enough points can still be demoted, there's no method to determine your current score, and players who synergize well win fast meaning there aren't enough points for everyone to rank up together. You pretty much have to make mistakes just to earn more points. (Will be fixed with future updates, hopefully)
3.) The Bloodweb/items currently are either super easy to understand & use, or is completely vague on how it works. The tutorials, as normal with beta releases, leaves a lot of information missing.

Go watch Twitch players to understand the mechanics of this game. It's a classic game of hide-and-seek with an adult theme. It's a blast to play, and feels ridiculously satisfying to escape the murderer, but the odds are blatantly stacked against you. That is what makes it fun.

Oyuna 5 oyuncu giriyorsunuz. 4 oyuncu hayatta kalmaya çalışıyor, 1 oyuncu ise katili oynayarak hayatta kalanları öldürmeye çalışıyor. Oyunda 5 tane elektrik jenaratörü tamir etmeniz gerekiyor. Tamir yaptıktan sonra kapı aktif oluyor  ve kapıyı açarak kaçıyorsunuz oyunu kazanıyorsunuz. Eğer kaçamazsanız katil 4 oyuncuyu öldürürse katil kazanıyor.

Hayatta kalanlar bütün oyun saklanarak diken üstünde oynuyor. Katil ise koşturarak hayatta kalanları arıyor. Hayatta kalanları farketmek oldukça zor. Gece, sisli, ağaçlı ve orta büyüklükte bir haritada bazen hiç rastlamıyorsunuz bile.

Oyun tek kelimeyle harika. Gerilim, aksiyon, puzzle her şey mevcut.

www.oyuncunundiyari.com

El juego en si esta bien, aunque con el paso del tiempo se vuelve repetitivo ya que hay una sola modalidad de juego (reparar generadores y activar las salidas de emergencia para huir, mientras evitamos al asesino de turno). Si bien hay muchas cosas que hacen falta mejorar, como la nula capacidad del superviviente para poder contrarrestar al asesino (solo contamos con limitadas barreras de madera que podemos soltarle en la cara para huir, pero no siempre es efectivo). Por otro lado, algunos asesinos estan bastante rotos (Si, me refiero a Michael Myers y su instakill) y otros quedan muy por debajo de nivel (La enfermera, el asesino mas dificil de usar). Pero no voy a entrar en el terreno de los asesinos ya que soy Main Survivor, asi que eso se lo dejo para algun Main Killer que quiera contar como se viven las cosas desde el otro lado.
Le doy un 7, pasa aprobado con lo justo, espero que con implementacion de nuevas cosas se vuelva mas entretenido porque sostengo que se vuelve repetitivo luego de unas horas de juego. Aun asi logra su cometido y divierte, y mucho (Cuando no tenes lag, porque si el asesino que hostea el juego tiene lag, te jodiste la partida y la diversion se va al tacho), claro sin contar los multiples bugs que hay, que hasta se vuelve divertido ver en cuantos bugs caes en cada partida y como te la arruinan (o no).

the idea of the game is great ....i played around 30 games won a few lost a few and got camped every time i got caught..and they say it doesnt happen but I am here to tell you that when you wiggle the killers counter it by dropping you and picking you up to restart timer....and im not sure what happens in the afternoon but only killer available is wraith ....you would think with three killers the devs would create a rotation so it wouldnt get boring  ..doesnt happen .....not very fun only three days and im ready to move on
Overall its a good game but the bad part about this game is that you can't queue with friends in online and you can't chat or communicate with your teammates.Atleast let us chat to one another.

Тут недалеко обсуждается Эволв стэйдж 2, который ф2п стал, принцип игры тот же - монстр/маньяк против 4 жертв. Беда у игр этих одна и та же - все матчи одинаковые. И после недели игры эти вещи ничего нового предложить в плане геймплея уже не могут.
A good game that can become much better.

It's fun. I enjoy playing as the killer, and I also enjoy playing as the survivors/victims. My only gripe is that there is no built in matchmaking lobby system to group with friends and search for public games. You can only play with friends if you play in a private match, but finding 4 friends to play with can be an issue.

Luckily it's actually fairly easy to lobby hop public matches to find your friends (I've only tried with 1 friend), we managed to play quite a few games together. Simply search at the same time as your friend until you both end up in the same lobby. This can take some time.

Other than that, the gameplay is fun, there's not too much lag (though it has been present and terrible in a few games, for the most part it's fine). Playing the killer and playing the victims is a completely different experience, almost as if you're playing 2 different games. The maps are varied and the progression system works well.

Also, I LOVE the perks. Like, it's so refreshing having perks that ACTUALLY make a difference and matter. Some of these perks are game changers, and completely change the feel and play of the game! Certain perks combo together, and overall the perks enhance the experience 10 fold. And since there's meaningful perks on both sides of the fence it's not OP or anything, as killers and survivors alike can both have meaningful perks that impact the game.

for example, the perk "Deerstalker" shows survivor auras within certain feet of you as the killer when they're on the ground, which changes your playstyle to leave people down more often and chase the other survivors, it's fun as hell. 

But on the survivor side, you have perks that allow you to heal yourself without a medkit, or sabotage without a toolkit, or silently hop over things at high speed with little to no noise, etc.

Overall, a fun game, I enjoy playing it, and it's well worth the 20 bucks.

評判とTwitchの放送数に騙されるな！思うほどおもしろいもじゃない！3ヶ月持てば良いゲームです！！！
私は気晴らしに買っただけなのですが500円程度（＄５,00弱）のゲームです。
こんなゲームに数千円（$10.00）も払わないでください！バグだらけ＆謎の強制終了（動作停止）の嵐です！
非常に不愉快な思いをしました、しかしアップデートが良い感じならもう少しだけ流行りそう。
とりあえず早く不具合を解消しないとこのゲームは直ぐに衰退するでしょう！
厳しい評価をつけますが「この段階で発売するようなゲームではない」と私は思いました。
ほとんどのユーザーが妥協してやってると思います、ストレスのたまらない程度にやるのが良いです :)
ムキになってこのゲームを続けるより他のゲームをやりましょう！そしてまた気が向いたら少し触れてみるのが一番良いと思いました。
買って見て不満だったら直ぐに返品しましょう！！！

This Game is great, the only two things that I don't like are not huge deals.

Firstly, the video settings are very minimal. You can only change "graphic setting" and the resolution, Also the resolution is changed from... a slidebar...


Secondly, people disconnect sometimes if they are about to die, just a suggestion, maybe have a cooldown on the quit button if they are low health or about to die. Maybe a 15 second wait before you can leave.

I Like this game alot but i hate the fact tht if ur against the Wraith(Killer) he is always invisible and always camping near the hook and i just find his character to be OP AF which just ruins this whole game and i am always in the game with tht killer and every1 seems to pick him because he is op but still a great game.

Убогая игра. Разрабы просто инвалиды. Объясню почему:
1. Локальные файлы в игре(плюс в открытом доступе), т.е. вы можете взять сейвы любого человека и кинуть к себе в игру, тем самым получаем овердохуя поинтов для прокачки персонажа.
2. На все тестирование у разрабов ушло около месяца(относиться и к альфе и к бете).
3. Багов ну очень много, а от разрабов одни обещания.
4. Поиграть с другом с рандом игроками возможно, если только вы попадете в одно лоби с ним(рандом).
5. Покупая DELUXE версию вы получаете ЦЕЛЫЙ САУНДТРЕК ИЗ ИГРЫ, а так же артбук(зарисовки самих разрабов или еще кого то там)

Вообщем надеялся, что в ближайшую неделю-полторы, будут исправлены баги и т.д., но кроме патчей, которые якобы фиксили баги, ничего не у разрабов не вышло. кароч 2/10

P.S. Ждем Friday the 13th
Nice

Very fun game to lock the doors, shut off the lights an rock a surround sound headset! VERY FUN but can get frustrating. The fact that you can not communicate with the other people makes it fun, an a pain. There is still a few problems, an bugs in the game. Unhooking a person, knocking down barriers, an such need to be worked out. Also the Ranking system is kind of tough. Sometimes you may DC or the monster quits the match an it counts at a win, but because you dont reach the minimum points you derank. Otherwise I find it fun to sneak away from a monster or to hunt down REAL people. As a survivor you see in 3d person so you can watch the monster running around an it freaks you out as he runs past you an doesnt see you. As the killer, first person view really makes you feel focused an brutal! A must play~ sounds an controls are pretty damn good. So beside the screwed up rank system an bugs I say get this game. I give it a 7-10! Enjoy everyone, an game hard!

Naja wo fangen wir an,Das spiel an sich wäre ok vom preisleistungs Verhältnis.Aber beim Release ist das spiel nicht ausgereift auf den markt gebracht worden um rechtzeitig für E3 was zuhaben.
Das aleine ist schon schwach,aber es geht noch weiter.Nach einiger zeit fingen an leute absichtlich zu Disconecten oder ingame  zu quiten,was dazu führte das spieler es schwer hatten punkte zu machen die man braucht um Perks freizuschalten us.

Jetzt würde man denken das die Devs dagegen was machen schnelstens weil es das spiel vergnügen und somit das spiel schadet.Weit gefehlt erst waren sie alle mit E3 beschäftig,wo sie ja offentsichtlich die leute ein nicht fertig oder ausgereiften spiel prässentierten.

Dann der erste update,man könnte denken das probleme die das spiel schaden zuerst behandelt werden,richtig?,Falsch hir bessere grafik wie einer läuft und hauptsächlich so ein quatsch,das einzigewas wichtig im update war waren die bugs die man in lobbys hatte^^.

So heute sah ich ein zweiten update,wunderte mich warum er nix runterladet.Also sehe ich nach der update ware die nicht gelieferten sachen für die Delux version.Also erstens hätten sie beim release fertig sein und geliefert werden sollen richtig?.Aber da war ja was achso ja E3

Nun schau ich rein und die devs hohlen sich spieldaten und sehen Twitch Übertragen an zu sehen wo probleme sind und was man dagegen machen könnte,Glaubt ihr nicht liesst es selbst nach im forum ^^.So jetzt is es nicht so das 1000 und mehr leute die probleme beim name gennant haben seit release im forum,und sogar lösungen vorgeschlagen haben.

Also alles im allen eine zehe geburt,hab persönlich das spiel zurzeit ganz eingestelt weil es nicht wirklich spielbar ist wenn man vortschritt ingame machen will.Ich mach  mal ne kurze liste von problemen für euch unten rein und entscheidet selbst ob ihr damit spielen könnt.

Ich rate euch davon ab bis das spiel vernünftig läuft,kann sich aber bei der entwicklung des update fortschrits noch um wochen oder monate handeln.Also zurzeit höchstens ne beta.

1.Cheater (ja gibts überal aber naja die cheat engine was sie eingebracht haben ist laut aussage auch nicht 100%)^^

2.Disconecter oder Quiter (Diese gibts vieleicht auch in jeden spiel aber hir schaden sie ddeine punkte als killer erheblich)

3.Trollen gegen den killer(Da der killer langsamer durch fenster ist und nicht über bretter springen kann nutzen viele spieler das aus um ringlepietz mit den killer zu spielen)

Manch einer sagt jetzt vieleicht das könnte man schnell ändern,aber ihr seht ja scheinbar nicht.Da muss man sich als Dev und oder Mod Twitch übertragungen reinziehen ^^.Alles im allen eine traurige entwicklung,und nachdem ich gesehen hab das ein Mod einen positiven review abgegeben hat trotz das er weiss das das spiel solche massiven probleme hat,ist es zeit um dies zu schreiben.

Fazit an sich ein guter ansatz aber durch E3 Hype und schleppenden Problem Beseitigung,ist es zurzeit nicht zu emphelen.

The best $20 I've spent on steam in a while.

Mit mondjak... ez egy remek játék, minden hibája ellenére. A 20€-s árcédulájával pedig kötelező vétel azoknak, akik egy kicsit is érdeklődnek a horror műfaja iránt. Olyan filmbéli elemeket tartalmaz, amit a nagy klasszikusokból szedtek össze a készítők. Bár én nem vagyok odáig az ilyen játékokért, napok óta nem tudom letenni. Csak ajánlani tudom.

Pozitívumok:
+ Lehetsz gyilkos, ahol kiélheted rejtett pszichopata énedet :D
+ Remek zenei aláfest
+ Áldozatként igazi para, de gyilkosként is magasan van az adrenalin
+ Nem gondolná az átlag gamer, de nagy hangsúly van az ügyességen és a stratégián ebben a játékban
+ Sokféleképpen skálázható karakterek, perkek, add-on-ok
+ Elég jól néz ki, ennek ellenére nem hatalmas gépigényű
+ Addiktív, mint az állat
+ Remek ötletek, amire nem is gondolna az ember
+ A random generált pályák remekül operálnak (ritkán fordul elő kétszer ugyanolyan pályarész)
+ A fejlesztők dolgoznak rajta (még)

Negatívumok:
- Még vannak bugok
- A közösség sokszor bugyuta
- A rangrendszer szinte felesleges
- Nincs még lehetőség barátokkal játszani, csak privát lobby-ban
- Néha még kifagy
- Be lehet akadni objektumokba, így bukhatjuk a mérkőzést
- Az ablakon átugrálás bosszantóan op
- Sok a kilépkedő játékos
- Nehézkes match making
- Nehezen rank-olható felfelé, bukni viszont könnyű
- Balance hiánya, amit később gondolom orvosolnak
- Erőse a gyanú a fizetős DLC-k és a (remélhetőleg nem p2w) mikro tranzakció megjelenése!

Update: A megjelenés óta csak jobb lett. A fejlesztők szép számmal gyártják hozzá az ingyenes és fizetős DLC-ket is. Az egyik legjobb vétel volt Early Access nyitócímként.

Очень хорошая игра, но дизбаланс всё таки даёт о себе знать, маньяк не может поймать сразу 4 человека, каждый из которых чинит генератор на разных краях карты, но впрочем хорошо убивает время и даёт поразвлечься))

Yes, the ranking system and group matchup/que system needs reworking based upon community feedback, but overall this game is FUN! Simple, easy to start, and easy to understand.  Each game is different and still manages to scare the shit out of me when I'm playing as a survivor. Hopefully they can get a few updates out -as I am sure they will. Highly recommended!

I do like the game but as with any other game there is flaws with it and different preferences with it. As a game that I do truely like and matches my preference, the flaws however is just ridiculous.

flaws: 
1.It's not as glitchy but it can be glitchy

2.They need to do something about hook campers, or atleast some how force the team to kind of work together to get people off hooks. for example: Maybe lock the generators until your whole team is off the hooks? but whatever generator your on you can finish until you either exit off of it or you finish it. (it's just something to think about but that could have lots of flaws in that example to.)

3. I hate the fact that when you enter the game people could just leave and refuse you points. They should have some other kind of punishment instead of just losing rank or something like that. Like have an automated system to which they actually start to ban people if they leave?

4. Another one is that you can't even invite your friends to play in a public game and you play with total strangers with no chat, no VoIP. Not anything to communicate with your team. A lot of those people won't even come to help you and you lose rank for pretty much at the beginning of the game or after you did alot of stuff for the team.

Now even know I listed 4 flaws this is the bad stuff I experienced. Now away with the negativity and in with the positivity.

Pros:
1.It's a pretty good game for an adrealine rush, they did an amazing job to make you want to panic in times you feel like doing it, I can't help myself to always hop out of my spot everytime I see the monster coming at me but don't actually see me yet.

2. It's a great game afterall for teamwork and it makes you feel like you are just rewarded for baiting and for saving your team off of hooks.

3. It's very atmospheric with alot of the maps and makes you feel like your in a horror movie.

4. I love some of the perks you can get with killer, like the one that makes their skill check come up more then it usually does to the point when you are near a generator they panic and mess up.

5. Last but not least it's a good game after all just to make you feel like an adrealine junkie and make you freak out in dire situations.

Hammer Spiel, Leute ernsthaft.. hab nichts negatives bis jetzt gefunden. Spiele eh Solo, wer mit Freunde zusammen (gewertete Games) spielen will, muss noch warten bis zum nächsten Patch. Aber sonst Hammer Game mit wirklichen gutem Horrorefekt! Kaufts euch, ihr werdet es nicht bereuen! :D
A deadly game of hide-and-seek, very engaging and fun. However, the matchmaking system needs some work.

First Impressions:

Basically this game is all about surviving from the killer in which you need to activate generators to unlock the door to escape but there's a catch, the killer is there to prevent your escape by killing all of you. Points are given for each objective met. You can play either as a killer or a survivor. Killer would have to host. If you do not like the concept or the game where you find it to be quite redundant then it is not the right one for you, I suggest for you to search it up on youtube for its gameplay.

I've never played the beta, hence I do not know what are the problems then. Despite a few glitches here and there, I can say that I'm satisfied with the game thus far. Those glitches do not hinder the gameplay too much but if they are fixed then it is much appreciated. Playing online is a gamble, sometimes its silky smooth and sometimes its just plain laggy. The lobby matchmaking needs some revamp in terms of getting to play with your friends online in the same lobby and not always reshuffling to get into the same lobby with your friends (I see that a lot online). I really like how they cut-off the communication in game online as to avoid cheating and also stripping away the fun from it. 

Honestly, the ranking system is broke and it needs to be fixed but I'm a casual player so I don't really mind about it. From the games I've played so far, there are two types of killer. One, the killer would camp after hooking you up, 2nd the killer would hunt for other survivors giving them chance to save those that are hooked. I definitely prefer the latter to spice up the gameplay. Sadly, the mass majority camps at the hooked survivor and awaits for him/her to die which is kinda a kill-joy. A way to counter this is to slowly die by the hands of the killer so that you can stall time for other survivors to fix the generators. 

Since this game is new, I am more than happy to give the devs a chance to improve the game and also adding more content to it.

If you're willing to look beyond the ugly side of this game then you're going to have heaps of fun playing it.

I can easily recommend this game to anyone if you have the extra buck to go for it. Otherwise, if you think that this game is not suitable for you, you can do your wallet a favour by keeping it fat. Cheers :D
great game ranked need some help

After a long period of watching the game on Youtube, I have finally played this game with some friends. First of all, I want to say that the game is more than only a action, horror experience. It is a psychological thriller of its best.

You can win this game single handedly by talking to your killer "friend" and  lure him into wrong locations.

The only negative note I want to make is that you have to play online to unlock special skills or abilities. You are not able to unlock specific extras if you play in a private lobby with your friends.

All in all I definitely can recommend this game. It's fun to play, especially with some mates.

Dear Diary,

Today, I played as a killer for the second time (the first one totally sucked).

I like setting up traps, so I chose the Trapper.

During a chase, I walked on my own Bear Trap, preventing me from slashing down one of the two remaining survivors.

At the end, when I caught the last survivor (the other one escaped), I changed my mind and dutifully brought the one I had on me to the exit, even if it meant chasing and slashing him in the face to carry him again.

10/10 would walk on my own traps.
10/10 would give a piggyback ride to the exit.
Глюкнутая! Не интересная.

I was so bored after hours of csgo and was looking at new multiple games that aren't too pricey, and can satisfy me never really found any, until now. I can guarrente that if the developers keep working new updates on this game, its going to be huge.

Edit: Don't worry about the negative comments, this game is still fun for both sides, but because of the differences everyone expects to be the winner everytime, every match.

Not newbie friendly but that can be said for a lot of great games, if you have a pack of friends, minimum of 4 in total that plays this then you'll have a great time playing survivor, just don't take the game seriously, win or lose just have fun.

Killer is very interesting too, but some more viable at high ranks than others, still overall much more fun than survivor's generator simulator side when non of your friends are playing. recommend this game 8/10
After several patches, this game was fun to play and quite scary.
